metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9136 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Artifex Software, Inc. MuJS before a0ceaf5050faf419401fe1b83acfa950ec8a8a89 allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitive information by using the "crafted JavaScript" approach, related to a "Buffer Over-read" issue.

notes.Note: ratliff> mujs is in thirdparty directory of mupdf

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
